name: The Collective
description: At The Collective we are redefining the way people live in cities across the world through a customer centric approach to developing, designing and operating buildings, and an insatiable ambition to positively impact people’s lives at a meaningful scale.

jobs.title: Sales Internship
jobs.description:
This is an opportunity to be part of a truly innovative company within the property industry. We are looking for 3 individuals to join in a sales internship capacity.  In these roles you will work gain exposure to our entire Sales team. This is a fantastic chance to get involved in projects and to improve your skills set. The internships will last for approximately 3 months minimum and in some cases will vary with their start dates and end dates. 

Further insight into the Sales team below: 


SALES: JUNE/JULY - SEPTEMBER

What will you be involved in? 

•	An understanding of Co-living and our sales process across sites i.e. Old Oak, Canary Wharf and Dome. 
•	Exposure to our Property Management Software and sales CRM system. 
•	Act as the first point of contact dealing with new sales enquires 
•	Gain first-hand experience and exposure to Co-living sales tours
•	Delivering and ensuring the highest level of customer service

WHAT NEXT? 
We would like you to write a cover letter highlighting why you would like to join the Sales team for an internship and why! We want you to think carefully about what each of this team typically would do within a property business and highlight a few reasons for wanting to spend your time in that team and what you hope to achieve at the end of your internship. At The Collective we are always looking for switched on, hungry and down to earth people who are eager to be given more responsibility, to push themselves and to achieve incredible things!

BENEFITS: 
•	Regular company events and social gatherings 
•	Monday morning breakfast together as a company
•	The chance to be part of an exciting and growing start up!


Salary: £16,300 per annum pro rata for the months worked
